p: Built and designed to fit perfectly with our Transformer Tables and Sets, the Transformer Chairs will be a beautiful addition to your dining Set. In addition, they are also complete stackable and easily storable.

h2: Stain resistant and easy to clean
p: All Transformer Chairs are build with high resistant fabric and is layered with waterproof and stainproof guard. No matter what happens to them, they will always look like you just received them.
